body:
Hi.

Go to the revisions page and then click on the Avicore tab. Lastest contribution is titled as "Fix block lag" HYPE? Post feedback below if block lag is fixed.

Small Addon by javipepe: Probably the changes are not pushed to the servers yet, meaning that any change is probably in testing state and not live yet. So just remember that if you decide to post "it doesn't work". Regards o/
body_tagged:

title: Block lag has been fixed?

replies.body: I've had some, but definately not as much as I used to, thank god, it's all gone xd
replies.body_tagged: I've had some, but definately not as much as I used to, thank god, it's all gone xd

replies.body:
That's just your connection I believe.

Also, block lag seems to be the same for me, rip.
replies.body_tagged:
That's just your connection I believe.

replies.body: Lol just went on and tested, all you need to do is click over about 10cps and it litereally deletes everything.
replies.body_tagged: Lol just went on and tested, all you need to do is click over about 10cps and it litereally deletes everything.

replies.body:
It has not been pushed to the servers yet I think haha. When you make a commit it doesn't automatically sync the plugin with the servers', it has to be built and pushed to them.

It's probably in testing state, so I guess you shouldn't feel anything different...



yet :]
